title: Rubberbanding with Constant FPS and Ping (2)
body:
I'm still experiencing the same issues with rubberbanding when I average about 80-100 FPS and 70-80 ms. 

Porocles replied back to my first post and told me to run a log reader. The only logs that I had were back in June and July, but I'm also sure that that was when this problem was occurring for me (I took a long hiatus because of this issue). 

My logs came back as 90 or above (90,92,94), so I don't think it's a network issue. 

I have Comcast XFinity as my ISP and Archer T4U for my wireless adapter; however I don't think these are the issue since this problem only occurred after Riot had implemented the new Launcher UI Update back in the middle of 2017.


EDIT: I saw a Rioter reply to someone and tell them to turn on V-Sync and turn off Movement Prediction. I tried it and it didn't work out for me.

replies.body: Hey, sorry to hear the issue has been persisting for you.  I've created a ticket for you so our tech team can help you out directly.  Your ticket number is 32704379, hang tight!
